6.6.0.name: react-onclickoutside
6.6.0.description: An onClickOutside wrapper for React components

scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/react-onclickoutside.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/react-onclickoutside.min.js
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
